bibl.title: Rhinocolura "Al-Arish" in the Classical Writings and Papyri.
bibl.note: "We find that the town of Rhinocolura (mod. Al-Arish) formed a part of the Asiatic section of Egypt." Refers to P. Nessana III, 15.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: IBRAHIM Mohammed Abboudy, Rhinocolura "Al-Arish" in the Classical Writings and Papyri.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 737-772.
"We find that the town of Rhinocolura (mod. Al-Arish) formed a part of the Asiatic section of Egypt." Refers to P. Nessana III, 15.
